00001 W.dxul.mapElements = function(current){
00002     // check implementation
00003     if(!W.dxul[current.tagName]) return;
00004     // instantiate a xul element
00005     var xul = new W.dxul[current.tagName](current);
00006     // append core to body if exist (not yet appended to any object)
00007     if(xul.core && !xul.core.parentNode)
00008         xul.body.appendChild(xul.core);
00009     // register element
00010     this.elements[this.elements.length] = xul;
00011     // check children
00012     var children = current.children;
00013     if(children){
00014         if(!current.parent){
00015             document.body.appendChild(xul.body);
00016         }else if(!xul.body.parentNode) current.parent.appendChild(xul);
00017         return xul;
00018     }else if(!xul.body.parentNode) current.parent.appendChild(xul);
00019     return false;
00020 };

00028 W.dxul.interpreter = function(current){
00029     switch(current.nodeType){
00030         case 'ELEMENT':
00031             var parent = this.mapElements(current);
00032             if(!parent) break;
00033         // traverse children - recursive
00034         for(var i = 0; i < current.children.length; ++i){
00035             current.children[i].parent = parent;
00036             this.interpreter(current.children[i]);
00037         }
00038             break;
00039         case 'CDATA':
00040         case 'TEXT':
00041     };
00042 };
